[vc_row row_content_width=”grid” disable_background_image=”” vertical_lines=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1568904237557{padding-top: 102px !important;padding-bottom: 130px !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_row_inner row_content_width=”grid”][vc_column_inner]

Food Trailer Online

About Us

Food Trailer Online is a leading manufacturer and supplier of quality, affordable food trailers in New Zealand. Founded in 2017, our reputation is built on offering our customers the highest quality trailers and impeccable support. Our food trailers are designed, engineered, and built to meet the specific needs of our clients.

Contact Us
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner row_content_width=”grid” content_text_aligment=”left” css=”.vc_custom_1620199042435{padding-top: 75px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″]

Robust Construction

All our food trailers are constructed with premium heavy-duty materials for durability and strength. This warrants our trailers the longevity, minimum maintenance and smooth operation. that a commercial kitchen demands.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″]

Expert Craftsmanship

We are organized in our approach to the design and rely on top craftsmanship for our builds. Our expertise ensures that every trailer rolls out perfect, in design and functionality.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″]

Commercial Appliances

We only use commercial grade equipment and fittings. With a wide range of quality appliances and amenities to choose from, our trailers can be customised to suit your business needs.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″]

Quality Assurance

We value our customers and will deliver only the best. All our trailers are built in accordance with NZ standards and guidelines. We also provide clients assistance for approval processes.

[vc_empty_space height=”40px”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” row_content_width=”grid” disable_background_image=”1024″ vertical_lines=”yes” disable_animated_text=”” css=”.vc_custom_1620730875110{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 125px !important;background-position: 0 0 !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;}”][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1569413378447{padding-top: 7px !important;}”][vc_row_inner row_content_width=”grid”][vc_column_inner css=”.vc_custom_1567499344778{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]
FOOD TRAILER ONLINE

HASSLE-FREE FINANCING

We understand your dream because it’s ours too. We make that dream come true hassle-free by offering 100% financing for approved buyers. So, let’s get started and get your dream trailer running.

CONTACT US
CONTACT US
[/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]
